object.name: GiftInfo
object.description: Describes a service message about a regular gift that was sent or received.
object.html_description: Describes a service message about a regular gift that was sent or received.
object.rst_description: Describes a service message about a regular gift that was sent or received.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; only present for gifts received on behalf of business accounts
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; only present for gifts received on behalf of business accounts
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier of the received gift for the bot; only present for gifts received on behalf of business accounts
annotations.name: owned_gift_id

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars that can be claimed by the receiver by converting the gift; omitted if conversion to Telegram Stars is impossible
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of Telegram Stars that can be claimed by the receiver by converting the gift; omitted if conversion to Telegram Stars is impossible
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of Telegram Stars that can be claimed by the receiver by converting the gift; omitted if conversion to Telegram Stars is impossible
annotations.name: convert_star_count

annotations.description: Number of Telegram Stars that were prepaid by the sender for the ability to upgrade the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Number of Telegram Stars that were prepaid by the sender for the ability to upgrade the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Number of Telegram Stars that were prepaid by the sender for the ability to upgrade the gift
annotations.name: prepaid_upgrade_star_count

annotations.description: True, if the gift can be upgraded to a unique gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift can be upgraded to a unique gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the gift can be upgraded to a unique gift
annotations.name: can_be_upgraded

annotations.description: Text of the message that was added to the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Text of the message that was added to the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Text of the message that was added to the gift
annotations.name: text

annotations.description: Special entities that appear in the text
annotations.html_description: Optional. Special entities that appear in the text
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Special entities that appear in the text
annotations.name: entities

annotations.description: True, if the sender and gift text are shown only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the sender and gift text are shown only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. True, if the sender and gift text are shown only to the gift receiver; otherwise, everyone will be able to see them
annotations.name: is_private
